message_2:
To find the sample mean age, we need to add up all the ages and then divide by the number of employees in the sample (50).

Sample mean = (25 + 27 + 36 + 31 + 42 + 22 + 40 + 34 + 28 + 29 + 26 + 39 + 44 + 31 + 27 + 37 + 30 + 30 + 26 + 33 + 28 + 33 + 35 + 41 + 30 + 24 + 35 + 39 + 37 + 26 + 32 + 38 + 29 + 30 + 45 + 34 + 31 + 28 + 27 + 38 + 36 + 43 + 35 + 23 + 29 + 31 + 27 + 32 + 30 + 36) / 50

Sample mean = (1609) / 50

Sample mean = 32.18

Rounded to the nearest whole number, the sample mean age is 32 years.
